participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, enjoys hands-on activities and values family support.
participant_1.background: I began whittling and traveling the country in my car. I live in the great white north. If I can't order it on the internet, I don't need it. I play the piano to help my siblings relax. My family is very supportive of my skiing.

participant_2.name: Ava
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, loves to explore and enjoys spending quality time with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I love to travel and explore, but I always make sure to spend time with my family, too. I like things that explode. I used to own a casino. I check in with my pup. Nachos make me happy.

content.text: I've been getting into whittling lately, and I've been really enjoying it.
That's so cool! I used to do that when I was younger. It's so relaxing.
Right? I love being able to create something with my hands.
Me too. I've been meaning to get back into it, but I just haven't had the time.
Well, if you ever do, I'd love to see what you make.
I'll definitely keep you in mind!
What kind of things do you like to make?
I used to make a lot of small animals, like bears and rabbits.
That's so cool! I've never been very good at animals.
Well, you've got to start somewhere!
Yeah, I guess you're right.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel. I've been all over the world.
That's awesome! I wish I could travel more.
You should! It's so much fun to experience different cultures.
I know, I know. I'm working on it.
Well, I'm glad you're at least thinking about it.
Yeah, me too.
So, what's your favorite place you've ever been to?
That's a tough question. I have so many favorite places.
I know, right? It's hard to choose.
But I think I'd have to say my favorite place is Costa Rica.
I've heard that's a beautiful place.
It is! The beaches are amazing, and the jungle is so lush.
I've always wanted to go there.
You should! It's definitely worth it.
I'll keep that in mind.
Good
